channel.title: V on Home
channel.description: Recent content in V on Home

item.title: Tier V statistics
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier V during update 6.8. Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.8. On average, players played 45 battles. Median was 14 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.8 was 2720 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.

item.title: Tier V statistics
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier V during update 6.9. Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.9. On average, players played 47 battles. Median was 15 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.9 was 3715 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.

item.title: Tier V Tanks
item.description: Highest Average WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR at tier V during update 6.8. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update. Only tanks with more than 50 players are listed. This may filter out few upcoming tanks that are being tested. Highest Average WR - Table Average WR denotes average WR in a tank accross all the players during the update.

item.title: Tier V Tanks
item.description: Highest Average WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR at tier V during update 6.9. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update. Only tanks with more than 50 players are listed. This may filter out few upcoming tanks that are being tested. Highest Average WR - Table Average WR denotes average WR in a tank accross all the players during the update.
